website_summaries.verdict: Doom Eternal tops its predecessor by featuring larger maps filled with secrets, more ultra-violent weapons, and a huge variety of demons to slay. It is 2020's most extreme, first-person shooter.
pros: Huge selection of weapons and mods
cons: Battles become repetitive after a while

customer_reviews.title: Too difficult
customer_reviews.text: Even on the easiest setting it is a really difficult game and after being killed for the umpteenth time I have decided to give up on it at least the last Doom game have you a reasonable chance to advance through the levels.
customer_reviews.author: M. MCILROY

customer_reviews.title: A delicate dance of chaos.
customer_reviews.text: The game is a great update to the 2016 reboot. The idea of refilling health with glory kills, armour with flame thrower and ammo via chainsaw then the sword and bfg makes you always thinking what bar to tend to plus which weapon to use as different enemies are easier to kill with different weapon. The last couple of boss fights are so basic though same old big bad that we saw before a million times but the over all game is so worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Maku Shenoda

customer_reviews.title: Dangerously addictive gameplay.
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness. Someone has spent a lot of time getting the challenge level of this game just right. Addictively good. Flakey story, limited flavours of challenge (smash and leap), but so expertly crafted none of this matters. Blink and you’ve been playing for days, your wife has left you and your child has completed school, married and had kids of their own. .....just....one....more.....go....before....bed.
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son who says it's a great game.

customer_reviews.title: Not a real "Doom" - its a jumping puzzle game
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this is you like Doom style games. This is nothing like a real Doom game. Your marine has a flying castle spaceship and the gameplay revolves around you having to complete 'Tomb Raider' jumping puzzles. Its shocking that this game is called Doom. I bought this hoping it would be as much fun as the last Doom (2016) but its a huge step back in every way, from the graphics to the gameplay. I had forgotten just how annoying a bad game can be. Save your money for a real FPS!
customer_reviews.author: snake de plume

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Best game by a country mile I have played in years(a straight into all time top 10).An absolute must have. Cant sing it's praises highly enough, this is a fabulous game. Initially I was thinking boring repetitive shooter but give it time,it soon evolves into a total masterpiece.Long have I waited for a game with this amount of campaign that has you totally hooked.Thrilled that Bethesda put so much into this, well worth the wait. Don't even doubt this game, just buy it.You wont be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: CJ M

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the previous one, knock off feel.
customer_reviews.text: Comparing it with the previous doom, this feels like a knock of version. The graphics look worse, gameplay is not as smooth and feels clunkey. Puzzles that should really be in a gibbon (monkey) game. I was hoping for the same feel as the previous one so this just feels like a let down. Can't believe people are saying it's good, presume they didn't play the previous one. I was so looking forward to this, but after playing a few hours it feels like a Lego version of the previous one. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Powell

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as doom 2016
customer_reviews.text: Great graphics, improved scenery but you’ll spend the whole time running around with no ammo and the main way of getting more is using a chainsaw - that never has any fuel. Frustrating. Preferred the first one
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Dm Loring

customer_reviews.title: FPS BLISS
customer_reviews.text: Insane gunplay and great level design. Lots and lots of challenge and skill based combat arenas. Totally badass on every level. Superior to Doom 2016 in almost every way. You need to play smart and manage resources or you will be annihilated.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Slade

customer_reviews.title: Five stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely brilliant game just completed it if you like total destruction in your games this is a must
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Unwin

product_meta.title: Doom Eternal (PS4)
feature_bullets: Pre order to receive the "rip and tear Pack" , which now includes DOOM 64! (Image shown on page)

Slayer threat level at maximum - gain access to the latest demon-killing Tech with the DOOM slayer's advanced praetor suit, including a shoulder-mounted flamethrowers and the retractable wrist-mounted DOOM Blade. Upgraded guns and mods, such as the Super shotgun's new distance-closing meat hook attachment, and abilities like the double Dash make you faster, stronger, and more versatile than ever

unholy Trinity - you can't kill demons when you're Dead, and you can't stay alive without resources. Take what you need from your enemies: glory kill for extra health, incinerate for armor, and Chainsaw demons to stock up on ammo. These tools are the key to your survival and becoming the ultimate demon-slayer

a new class of (destructible) demon - obliterate more demons than ever before, each with unique attacks and abilities. Fan-favorite classics such as the pain elemental, archvile, and arachnotron make their return, while a horde of totally-new demons join the roster including the DOOM hunter, Marauder, and the Gladiator. Rip apart your favorite demons to the core with DOOM eternal's "destructible demons" System and take your power fantasy to new levels
